songs.title: Pink Ego Box/ Instant Messenger
songs.lyrics:
You've got post (only in Instant Messenger)

[Verse 1]
It's gonna be okay
Can’t afford another day
At 50 bytes per second
I’ve never seen your face
I’ve never heard your voice
But I think I like it

[Chorus]
When you instant message me
With a promise
I can feel it
I can tell you're gonna be
Just like me

[Verse 2]
My eyes are gonna strain
My heart is feeling pain
At 50 beats per second
I’ve never seen your eyes
I’ve never heard your lies
But I think I like it

[Chorus]

[Outro]
Be
Just like me
You turn
You turn
You turn on me
